p.01703376c4a81c0e9d91: Returns the theme assigned to the given brick, if any.
p.01703376c4a81c0e9d92:
Returns the theme that would be applied inside this brick if a UI component is displayed. This theme can be set directly on the brick itself or upward in the Context hierarchy, up to the Application level.

Note: internally, this brick uses the Contexts, as input, one can provided a tag of any Context.
